meanings.definition: Resembling a rose in color or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The sunset painted the sky a beautiful roseal hue.
meanings.sent2: She wore a lovely roseal dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The roseal walls of the house made it look like a fairy-tale castle.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the essence of a roseal garden in his painting.
meanings.sent5: The roseal petals of the flower glistened in the morning dew.

meanings.sent1: The roseal fragrance filled the garden with a sweet scent.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite flower was the roseal bloom in her backyard.
meanings.sent3: The roseal pattern on the china plates added elegance to the table setting.
meanings.sent4: The roseal essence of the perfume reminded her of her grandmother's garden.
meanings.sent5: The roseal petals seemed to dance in the gentle breeze.
